verses.verse: And <WG2532> he began<WG756> to speak<WG3004> unto them<WG846> in<WG1722> parables<WG3850>. A man<WG444> planted<WG5452> a vineyard<WG290>, and<WG2532> set<WG4060> a hedge about<WG5418> it<WG2532>, and digged<WG3736> a pit for the winepress<WG5276>, and<WG2532> built<WG3618> a tower<WG4444>, and<WG2532> let<WG1554> it<WG846> out<WG1554> to husbandmen<WG1092>, and<WG2532> went into another country<WG589>.

And <WG2532> at the season<WG2540> he sent<WG649> to<WG4314> the husbandmen<WG1092> a servant<WG1401>, that<WG2443> he might receive<WG2983> from<WG3844> the husbandmen<WG1092> of<WG575> the fruits<WG2590> of the vineyard<WG290>.
And <WG1161> they took<WG2983> him<WG2532>, and beat<WG1194> him<WG846>, and sent<WG649> him away<WG649> empty<WG2756>.

And <WG2532> again<WG3825> he sent<WG649> unto<WG4314> them<WG846> another<WG243> servant<WG1401>; and him<WG2548> they<WG3036> wounded<WG2775> in the head<WG2775>, and2532, 649 handled821, 649 shamefully.
And <WG2532> he sent<WG649> another<WG243>; and<WG2532> him<WG2548> they killed<WG615>: and<WG1161> many<WG4183> others<WG243>; beating<WG1194> some<WG3303>, and<WG1161> killing<WG615> some<WG3588>.

He <WG3767> had<WG2192> yet<WG2089> one<WG1520>, a<WG846> beloved<WG27> son<WG5207>: he sent<WG649> him846, 2532 last<WG2078> unto<WG4314> them<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, They will reverence<WG1788> my<WG3450> son<WG3754>.

But <WG1161> those<WG1565> husbandmen<WG1092> said<WG2036> among<WG4314> themselves<WG3754>, This<WG3778> is<WG2076> the heir<WG2818>; come<WG1205>, let us kill<WG615> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> the inheritance<WG2817> shall be<WG2071> ours<WG2257>.
And <WG2532> they took<WG2983> him<WG846>, and killed<WG615> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> cast<WG1544> him forth out of<WG1854> the vineyard<WG290>.

What <WG5101> therefore<WG3767> will<WG2962> the lord<WG2962> of the vineyard<WG290> do<WG4160>? he will come<WG2064> and<WG2532> destroy<WG622> the husbandmen<WG1092>, and<WG2532> will give<WG1325> the vineyard<WG290> unto others<WG243>.

Have ye<WG314> not<WG3761> read<WG314> even this<WG3778> scripture<WG1124>: The stone<WG3037> which<WG3739> the builders<WG3618> rejected<WG593>, The same was<WG3778> made<WG1096> the<WG1519> head<WG2776> of the corner<WG1137>;

And <WG2532> they sought<WG2212> to lay hold<WG2902> on him<WG846>; and<WG2532> they feared<WG5399> the multitude<WG3793>; for<WG1063> they perceived<WG1097> that<WG3754> he spake<WG2036> the parable<WG3850> against<WG4314> them<WG846>: and they left<WG863> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> went away<WG565>.

Shall we give<WG1325>, or<WG2228> shall we<WG1325> not<WG3361> give<WG1325>? But<WG1161> he<WG3588>, knowing<WG1492> their<WG846> hypocrisy<WG5272>, said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Why<WG5101> make ye<WG3985> trial of me<WG3427>? bring<WG5342> me<WG3165> a denarius<WG1220>, that<WG2443> I may see it<WG1492>.

And <WG1161> they brought<WG5342> it<WG2532>. And he saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Whose<WG5101> is this<WG3778> image<WG1504> and<WG2532> superscription<WG1923>? And<WG1161> they said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Caesar<WG2541>'s.

And <WG2532> there come<WG2064> unto<WG4314> him<WG846> Sadducees<WG4523>, who<WG3748> say<WG3004> that there is<WG1511> no<WG3361> resurrection<WG386>; and<WG2532> they asked<WG1905> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>,

Teacher <WG1320>, Moses<WG3475> wrote<WG1125> unto us<WG3754>, If<WG1437> a man<WG5100>'s brother<WG80> die<WG599>, and<WG2532> leave<WG2641> a wife<WG1135> behind him<WG2532>, and leave<WG863> no<WG3361> child<WG5043>, that<WG2443> his<WG846> brother<WG80> should take<WG2983> his<WG846> wife<WG1135>, and<WG2532> raise up<WG1817> seed<WG4690> unto his<WG846> brother<WG80>.

In <WG1722> the resurrection386, 3767 whose<WG5101> wife<WG1135> shall she be<WG2071> of them<WG846>? for<WG1063> the seven<WG2033> had<WG2192> her<WG846> to wife<WG1135>.

Jesus <WG2424> said<WG2036> unto<WG611> them<WG846>, Is it not<WG3756> for this cause<WG5124> that ye<WG4105> err<WG4105>, that ye<WG4105> know<WG1492> not<WG3361> the scriptures<WG1124>, nor<WG3366> the power<WG1411> of God<WG2316>?

For <WG1063> when<WG3752> they shall rise<WG450> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>, they<WG1060> neither<WG3777> marry<WG1060>, nor<WG3777> are given in marriage<WG1061>; but<WG235> are<WG1526> as<WG5613> angels<WG32> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>.

But <WG1161> as touching<WG4012> the dead<WG3498>, that<WG3754> they are raised<WG1453>; have ye<WG314> not<WG3756> read<WG314> in<WG1722> the book<WG976> of Moses<WG3475>, in the place<WG1909> concerning the Bush<WG942>, how<WG5613> God<WG2316> spake<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, I<WG1473> am the God<WG2316> of Abraham<WG11>, and<WG2532> the God<WG2316> of Isaac<WG2464>, and<WG2532> the God<WG2316> of Jacob<WG2384>?

And <WG2532> one<WG1520> of the scribes<WG1122> came<WG4334>, and heard<WG191> them<WG846> questioning together<WG4802>, and knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> he had answered<WG611> them<WG846> well<WG2573>, asked<WG1905> him<WG846>, What commandment<WG1785> is<WG2076> the first<WG4413> of all<WG3956>?
Jesus <WG2424> answered<WG611>, The<WG3754> first<WG4413> is<WG191>, Hear, O Israel<WG2474>; The Lord<WG2962> our<WG2257> God<WG2316>, the Lord<WG2962> is<WG2076> one<WG1520>:

and <WG2532> thou shalt love<WG25> the Lord<WG2962> thy<WG4675> God<WG2316> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> heart<WG2588>, and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> soul<WG5590>, and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> mind<WG1271>, and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> strength<WG2479>.

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG3004>, as he taught<WG1321> in<WG1722> the temple<WG2411>, How<WG4459> say<WG3004> the scribes<WG1122> that<WG3754> the Christ<WG5547> is<WG2076> the son<WG5207> of David<WG1138>?

David <WG1138> himself<WG846> said<WG2036> in<WG1722> the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151>, The Lord<WG2962> said<WG2036> unto my<WG3450> Lord<WG2962>, Sit thou<WG2521> on<WG1537> my<WG3450> right hand<WG1188>, Till<WG2193> I<WG302> make<WG5087> thine<WG4675> enemies<WG2190> the footstool<WG4228> of thy feet<WG4675>.

they that<WG3588> devour<WG2719> widows<WG5503>' houses<WG3614>, and<WG2532> for a pretence<WG4392> make<WG4336> long<WG3117> prayers<WG4336>; these<WG3778> shall receive<WG2983> greater<WG4053> condemnation<WG2917>.
